alert.note: Alert for Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 10 at 9:42AM EDT until further notice by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Florida and Georgia... St Mary`s River At Macclenny affecting Baker, Nassau and Charlton Counties. Additional information is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/forecasts.php?wfo=jax. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...St Mary`s River At Macclenny. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Minor flooding of low lying areas and timber lands including some properties along St. Mary`s River Bluff Road and the Cypress Landing Resort on the Georgia side. At 14.0 feet, Flooding of bottomlands along the river and some lower access roads including the lower half of St. Mary`s River Bluff Road which cuts off 15 to 20 homes on the Georgia side. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM EDT Saturday the stage was 12.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 12.5 feet early Monday morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
